  • vpipe.steps.dataprep.fill_absent_dates

Source code for vpipe.steps.dataprep.fill_absent_dates

from sklearn.base import BaseEstimator, TransformerMixin
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from vpipe.utils import global_vars as var


what = var.WHAT_COLUMN
where = var.WHERE_COLUMN
when = var.WHEN_COLUMN


[docs]class FillAbsentDates(BaseEstimator, TransformerMixin):

    def __init__(self):
        pass

    def fit(self, X, y=None):
        return self

    def transform(self, X):
        mo = X
        data = mo.get_data()
        params = mo.get_params()
        dataprep_config = mo.get_dataprep_config()

        if 'data_frequencies' in dataprep_config:
            for data_name in data.keys():
                if (data_name in ('target', 'validation', 'related')) and (data_name in dataprep_config['data_frequencies']):
                    df = data[data_name].copy()
                    dimensions = [col_name for col_name in df.columns if col_name in [what, where]]
                    cols_order = list(df.columns)
                    if 'demand' in df.columns:
                        df = df[df['demand'] > 0]

                    ref_date = params[data_name + '_to_date']
                    from_date = params[data_name + '_from_date']
                    frequency = dataprep_config['data_frequencies'][data_name]

                    df_min_data_atend = df[dimensions+[when]]\
                        .groupby(dimensions).min().reset_index().rename(columns={when:'min_date'})
                    df_min_data_atend['min_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df_min_data_atend['min_date'])
                    df_min_data_atend['from_date'] = pd.to_datetime(from_date)
                    df_min_data_atend['min_date'] = np.where((df_min_data_atend['from_date'].isnull()) | (df_min_data_atend['min_date'] >= df_min_data_atend['from_date']), df_min_data_atend['min_date'], df_min_data_atend['from_date'])

                    min_data_atend = min(df_min_data_atend['min_date'])
                    max_data_atend = max(df[when]) if ref_date is None else ref_date

                    dates = pd.DataFrame(pd.date_range(start = min_data_atend, end = max_data_atend, freq = frequency), columns=[when])
                    dates['key'] = 1
                    df_min_data_atend['key'] = 1
                    result = dates.merge(df_min_data_atend, on='key')
                    result = result[result[when] >= result['min_date']].drop(['key', 'min_date', 'from_date'], axis=1)

                    result[when] = pd.to_datetime(result[when])

                    merged = result.merge(df, how='left', on=dimensions+[when])
                    merged.sort_values(dimensions+[when], inplace=True)

                    data[data_name] = merged[cols_order]

            mo.set_data(data)

        return mo
